background.history: Aldric grew up in the bustling town of Riverbend, where his family ran a modest but successful trading business. After a tragic fire claimed his parents' lives, he and his younger sister Estrid managed to rebuild the business. Aldric, however, felt the call of the open road and chose to become a wandering merchant, leaving the stationary business to Estrid. His travels have made him a shrewd negotiator and a man of many stories.

personality.motivations: Aldric is driven by a desire to amass wealth and knowledge. He dreams of one day returning to Riverbend as a wealthy and respected merchant, with tales and riches from faraway lands.

wares: fine silks from the eastern realms

short_term: set up a stall in the town square to sell wares
gather information on local trade opportunities
explore the town and make connections with influential locals
long_term: build a reputation as a trustworthy and exotic merchant
acquire unique items to sell back in Riverbend
